ValidationRule.description: Both Qualtrics Instrument ID and Instrument need to be set when either is set.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( Qualtrics_Instrument_ID__c ), ISCHANGED( Instrument__c ) ), OR( AND(NOT( ISBLANK( Qualtrics_Instrument_ID__c )),ISBLANK( Instrument__c )), AND(NOT( ISBLANK( Instrument__c )),ISBLANK( Qualtrics_Instrument_ID__c )) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Both Qualtrics Instrument ID and Instrument need to be set when either is set.
